notes.text: We now hide FormElements when the visibility of all contained fields is set to false
You can now navigate to a specific object page in an app with multiple entity sets
You can now group actions for the overflow toolbar.
We now use a single batch request when an operation is executed for multiple items
You can now configure the popin layout for responsive tables
You can now set a horizontal layout for a group of checkboxes
We now support checkbox groups in forms
We've resolved an issue where the list report with a multi-input field displayed an error message when a draft was discarded in apps using the flexible column layout
We now ensure that side effects are executed correctly when a MultiValueField is changed in a table
We've resolved an issue with the deletion of parent and child nodes
We now exclude hidden properties in an analytical table when using the Export feature in split mode
